scripts.build: vite build && tsc src/content-script.ts src/background.ts --outDir dist && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: cp src/manifest.json . && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp dist/background.js . && cp dist/content-script.js . && [ ! -d public ] && cp -r public . || true && cp dist/src/popup/index.html ./popup.html && cp dist/src/sidepanel/index.html ./sidepanel.html && cp dist/assets/popup-*.js ./popup.js && cp dist/assets/sidepanel-*.js ./sidepanel.js && mkdir -p assets && cp dist/assets/modulepreload-polyfill-*.js ./assets/ && cp dist/assets/*.map ./assets/ 2>/dev/null || true
